name: Haters, kill them all!
description:
The modern world is very cruel. When you create something, there are haters. It does not matter if you did well or not, for a long time you did it or in 5 minutes. For them, only one thing is important: crap your idea. Haters like zombies: they can not create, but they are always ready to destroy.The game has 3 modes:
  • Classical mode;
  • Hard mode;
  • Survival mode;

Kill the haters in the guise of a zombie, get money for it, upgrade your weapons and your brains!Features of the game:
  • You can punish all haters;
  • You can upgrade brains and weapons in a special store;
  • A global kill counter to know how many hitters you've killed for the whole game!;
  • You can chill out after a day's work;
  • 3 game modes that suit everyone! [/ list]
